cheat.desc: Enable these Mode cheats on the Character Selection Screen.

cheat.comment: Alternative Ism. No gauges, air blocks, taunts etc.
Greater damage inflicted, greater damage done. Only lose one round to lose.
Easy to get dizzy, slightly less damage done, rubbish!
Enable only after selecting your ISM on the Character Selection screen
Free player selection - Use on the level VS screen.
